mapper.select: select max(position) as position from reply;
mapper.insert: insert into reply(communityNo, userNo, replyContent, position, depth, regDate) values(#{communityNo}, #{userNo}, #{replyContent}, #{position}, #{depth}, now());
mapper.select: select r.replyNo as replyNo, r.communityNo as communityNo, r.userNo as userNo, u.username as username, r.replyContent as replyContent, r.position as position, r.depth as depth, r.regDate as regDate from reply as r join user u on r.userNo = u.userNo where r.communityNo= #{communityNo};
